class.name: Shortcut
class.description: A shortcut for binding input. Shortcuts are commonly used for interacting with a [Control] element from an [InputEvent] (also known as hotkeys).

method.name: has_valid_event
method.description: Returns whether the shortcut has a valid [member event] assigned to it.

method.name: matches_event
method.description: Returns whether the shortcut's [member event] matches [code]event[/code].

members.member: The shortcut's [InputEvent]. Generally the [InputEvent] is a keyboard key, though it can be any [InputEvent], including an [InputEventAction].
